result.purpose: Responsible for defining data structures, constants, and types related to notification services, including push notifications and Apple Push Notification Service (APNs).
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related functionalities into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/domains/notification/models/apn.purpose: Defines types and constants for Apple Push Notification Service (APNs) settings and responses.

internal/domains/notification/models/con.purpose: Defines constants used in the notification domain models.

internal/domains/notification/models/mes.purpose: Defines a PostNotificationMessage structure for handling notification messages with idempotency keys.

internal/domains/notification/models/pus.purpose: Defines data structures and types for handling push notifications.
